long_description: A 4 in. wide tire for biking in the snow, mud or sand, the 45North Husker Du Fatbike Tire offers a great combination of traction and low rolling resistance. Tightly spaced center blocks roll fast and loosely spaced shoulder knobs give more bite on the sides. Equal tread depth across the casing enhances steering and tracking performance in a wide variety of conditions. 27 tpi thread count; the 45North Husker Du Fatbike tire is compatable with 65-102mm wide rims.
short_description: A 4 in. wide tire for biking in the snow, mud or sand, the 45North Husker Du Fatbike Tire offers a great combination of traction and low rolling resistance.
